build i0420-0800

I was in the CVS repo view and I drilled down to a version of core.runtime and
selected Compare With -> HEAD. After the compare came up I clicked on a file, it
opened the structured compare and I got the NPE. Then clicking on any other
files did nothing.

I just hit the same thing trying to compare two revisions from the CVS Resource 
History view.

To reproduce this, just double-click a folder instead of a file in the compare 
viewer. I hit this because I hit Enter to open the file that appeared to be 
selected in the view; but apparently, the file wasn't really selected, a folder 
was.

Created an attachment (id=10038)
ResourceEditionNode.patch

Here's a patch that fixes the problem.
